answers.name: Sarah
answers.vision_life: Work from home, set my own schedule, choose clients I'm passionate about helping
answers.who_they_help: Mid-career professionals feeling stuck or unfulfilled in their current roles
answers.why_now: Been thinking about this for 2 years. Certified last year. Ready to make the leap.
answers.business_stage: Pre-launch, have 2 test clients who are loving it
answers.client_acquisition: Word of mouth from friends and former colleagues
answers.website_feeling: Looks amateur and doesn't reflect my expertise
answers.time_wasters: Constantly second-guessing my website copy and design. Watching too many YouTube tutorials instead of taking action.
blockers: Fear of not being good enough
answers.support_system: Supportive partner, but doing this alone business-wise
answers.timeline: Want to launch properly in 3 months
answers.budget: £300-500 to start, can invest more once I'm making money
answers.one_year_vision: Working full-time in my business, serving 10-15 clients per month, making £4-5k monthly income
answers.one_thing: Get my website launched and start taking bookings confidently
answers.anything_else: I keep comparing myself to other coaches who seem so polished and established. I know I'm good at what I do, but I'm scared of putting myself out there.
